/*This code was generated using the UMPLE 1.18.0.3239 modeling language!*/

package example;
import java.util.*;
import java.lang.Thread;

public class QueuedWithConcurrentStateMachines implements Runnable
{
  @java.lang.annotation.Retention(java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
  public @interface umplesourcefile{int[] line();String[] file();int[] javaline();int[] length();}

  //------------------------
  // MEMBER VARIABLES
  //------------------------

  //QueuedWithConcurrentStateMachines State Machines
  enum Sm { s1, s2 }
  enum SmS2a { Null, s2a }
  enum SmS2b { Null, s2b }
  private Sm sm;
  private SmS2a smS2a;
  private SmS2b smS2b;
  
  //enumeration type of messages accepted by QueuedWithConcurrentStateMachines
  enum MessageType { e1_M, e2_M }
  
  MessagePool pool;
  Thread removal;

  //------------------------
  // CONSTRUCTOR
  //------------------------

  public QueuedWithConcurrentStateMachines()
  {
    setSmS2a(SmS2a.Null);
    setSmS2b(SmS2b.Null);
    setSm(Sm.s1);
    pool = new MessagePool();
    removal=new Thread(this);
    //start the thread of QueuedWithConcurrentStateMachines
    removal.start();
  }

  //------------------------
  // INTERFACE
  //------------------------

  public String getSmFullName()
  {
    String answer = sm.toString();
    if (smS2a != SmS2a.Null) { answer += "." + smS2a.toString(); }
    if (smS2b != SmS2b.Null) { answer += "." + smS2b.toString(); }
    return answer;
  }

  public Sm getSm()
  {
    return sm;
  }

  public SmS2a getSmS2a()
  {
    return smS2a;
  }

  public SmS2b getSmS2b()
  {
    return smS2b;
  }

  public boolean _e1()
  {
    boolean wasEventProcessed = false;
    
    Sm aSm = sm;
    switch (aSm)
    {
      case s1:
        setSm(Sm.s2);
        wasEventProcessed = true;
        break;
      default:
        // Other states do respond to this event
    }

    return wasEventProcessed;
  }

  private boolean enterS2()
  {
    boolean wasEventProcessed = false;
    
    SmS2a aSmS2a = smS2a;
    SmS2b aSmS2b = smS2b;
    switch (aSmS2a)
    {
      case Null:
        setSmS2a(SmS2a.s2a);
        wasEventProcessed = true;
        break;
      default:
        // Other states do respond to this event
    }

    switch (aSmS2b)
    {
      case Null:
        setSmS2b(SmS2b.s2b);
        wasEventProcessed = true;
        break;
      default:
        // Other states do respond to this event
    }

    return wasEventProcessed;
  }

  private boolean exitS2()
  {
    boolean wasEventProcessed = false;
    
    SmS2a aSmS2a = smS2a;
    SmS2b aSmS2b = smS2b;
    switch (aSmS2a)
    {
      case s2a:
        setSmS2a(SmS2a.Null);
        wasEventProcessed = true;
        break;
      default:
        // Other states do respond to this event
    }

    switch (aSmS2b)
    {
      case s2b:
        setSmS2b(SmS2b.Null);
        wasEventProcessed = true;
        break;
      default:
        // Other states do respond to this event
    }

    return wasEventProcessed;
  }

  public boolean _e2()
  {
    boolean wasEventProcessed = false;
    
    SmS2a aSmS2a = smS2a;
    SmS2b aSmS2b = smS2b;
    switch (aSmS2a)
    {
      case s2a:
        setSmS2b(SmS2b.s2b);
        wasEventProcessed = true;
        break;
      default:
        // Other states do respond to this event
    }

    switch (aSmS2b)
    {
      case s2b:
        exitSm();
        setSm(Sm.s1);
        wasEventProcessed = true;
        break;
      default:
        // Other states do respond to this event
    }

    return wasEventProcessed;
  }

  private void exitSm()
  {
    switch(sm)
    {
      case s2:
        exitS2();
        break;
    }
  }

  private void setSm(Sm aSm)
  {
    sm = aSm;

    // entry actions and do activities
    switch(sm)
    {
      case s2:
        if (smS2a == SmS2a.Null) { setSmS2a(SmS2a.s2a); }
        if (smS2b == SmS2b.Null) { setSmS2b(SmS2b.s2b); }
        break;
    }
  }

  private void setSmS2a(SmS2a aSmS2a)
  {
    smS2a = aSmS2a;
    if (sm != Sm.s2 && aSmS2a != SmS2a.Null) { setSm(Sm.s2); }
  }

  private void setSmS2b(SmS2b aSmS2b)
  {
    smS2b = aSmS2b;
    if (sm != Sm.s2 && aSmS2b != SmS2b.Null) { setSm(Sm.s2); }
  }

  public void delete()
  {}

  protected class Message
  {
    MessageType type;
    
    //Message parameters
    Vector<Object> param;
    
    public Message(MessageType t, Vector<Object> p)
    {
      type = t; 
      param = p;
    }

    @Override
    public String toString()
    {
      return type + "," + param;
    }
  }
  
  protected class MessagePool {
    Queue<Message> messages = new LinkedList<Message>();
    
    public synchronized void put(Message m)
    {
      messages.add(m); 
      notify();
    }

    public synchronized Message getNext()
    {
      try {
        while (messages.isEmpty()) 
        {
          wait();
        }
      } catch (InterruptedException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } 

      //The element to be removed
      Message m = messages.remove(); 
      return (m);
    }
  }

  //------------------------------
  //messages accepted 
  //------------------------------

  public void e1 ()
  {
    pool.put(new Message(MessageType.e1_M, null));
  }

  public void e2 ()
  {
    pool.put(new Message(MessageType.e2_M, null));
  }

  
  @Override
  public void run ()
  {
    boolean status=false;
    while (true) 
    {
      Message m = pool.getNext();
      
      switch (m.type)
      {
        case e1_M:
          status = _e1();
          break;
        case e2_M:
          status = _e2();
          break; 
        default:
      }
      if(!status)
      {
        // Error message is written or  exception is raised
      }
    }
  }
}
